description: Lists the  PermissionSets in an IAM Identity Center instance.

parameters.name: InstanceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the IAM Identity Center instance under which the operation will be executed. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and Amazon Web Services Service Namespaces in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: PermissionSets
nested_items.description: Defines the level of access on an Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token for the list API. Initially the value is null. Use the output of previous API calls to make subsequent calls.
